price: Er sagte: „Ich bin wahrlich Allahs Diener; Er hat mir die Schrift gegeben und mich zu einem Propheten gemacht.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qāla innī ʿabdu al-lahi ātāniya al-kitāba wajaʿalanī nabiyyan
